type.name: EntityFrameworkServicesBuilder
type.summary: Provides Entity Framework specific APIs for configuring services in an . These APIs are usually accessed by calling and then chaining API calls on the returned .

syntax.content.vb: Public Shared Function Extract(options As IDbContextOptions) As RelationalOptionsExtension

type.name: IDbContextOptions
type.summary: The options to be used by a . You normally override or use a to create instances of classes that implement this interface, they are not designed to be directly created in your application code.
